**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _glimmering missive_ sparkles as you compose it. When activated, it explodes, disintegrating into a shower of multicolored motes in a 10-foot burst from a corner of the missive's space. Creatures in the area are covered in sparkling dust that remains luminous for 1 hour. Visible creatures can't be concealed while covered by the luminous dust; any [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while covered in the luminous dust, rather than being [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39).

<column gap="tiny">
